TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExemptionMechanism extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides the functionality of an exemption mechanism, examples of which are key recovery, key weakening, and key escrow.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public hidebysig instance int32 GenExemptionBlob(unsigned int8[] output, int32 outputOffset) cil managed

Docs.param: the offset in output where the result is stored
Docs.summary: Generates the exemption mechanism key blob, and stores the result in the output buffer, starting at outputOffset inclusive.
Docs.returns: the number of bytes stored in output

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Javax.Crypto.ExemptionMechanism GetInstance(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.param: the standard name of the requested exemption mechanism. See the ExemptionMechanism section in the Java Cryptography Architecture Standard Algorithm Name Documentation for information about standard exemption mechanism names.
Docs.summary: Returns an ExemptionMechanism object that implements the specified exemption mechanism algorithm.

Docs.exception: if the specified algorithm is not available by any provider.
if the algorithm parameter is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetOutputSize(int32 inputLen) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the length in bytes that an output buffer would need to be in order to hold the result of the next #genExemptionBlob(byte[]) genExemptionBlob operation, given the input length inputLen (in bytes).
Docs.returns: the required output buffer size (in bytes)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsCryptoAllowed(class Java.Security.IKey key) cil managed

Docs.param: the key the crypto is going to use.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the result blob has been generated successfully by this exemption mechanism.
Docs.returns: whether the result blob of the same key has been generated successfully by this exemption mechanism; false if key is null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while determining whether the result blob has been generated successfully.
